item.title: prevent unauthorized root access in OS X High Sierra
kernel eating 700 percent of CPU
item.description: 11:08 Tuesday 02 June 2015 JST Why is kernel on my Mac using 700% of the CPU? I can’t get shit done.

item.title: stupid Finder
fucking Finder
item.description: ##21:56 Wednesday 17 December 2014 JST## More than once in recent memory, Finder has hung when trying to load images. It responds in every other way, but simply refuses to display the files in the Finder window where they should be displayed. Why? It’s (fortunately) not the (SSD) drive dying; Emacs loads the list of files immediately, but Finder just hangs. Even Terminal displays them instantly. And it’s not like there’s a million files.
